data.name: Matchcraft: Efir Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Try yourself as a master in crafting equipment for flying aetherships.

Play and collect - participate in the crafting process directly! Collect useful materials and create powerful items. Item strength will depend on your skill!

Evolve Blueprints - Each blueprint for crafting an item can be improved and modified to suit your goals.

Expand your island - build and upgrade buildings to expand and enhance your item assembly capabilities.

Equip Expeditions - From time to time you will get the opportunity to equip expeditions to the far reaches of the universe and receive a worthy reward. The more generously and wisely you equip the expedition, the more worthy reward you will expect!

Adapt to change and take advantage of the changing global conditions to your advantage, whether it be good deals or a meteor storm!

data.short_description: Welcome to Matchcraft: Efir Adventure, a unique hybrid of item crafting sim and match3 mechanic with RPG elements.
